subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jiri Hudler scored and Dominik Hasek made three saves in a shootout, lifting the Detroit Red Wings to a 3-2 victory over the visiting Anaheim Ducks last night in a rematch of the Western Conference finals.
snippet: Jiri Hudler scored and Dominik Hasek made three saves in a shootout, lifting the Detroit Red Wings to a 3-2 victory over the visiting Anaheim Ducks last night in a rematch of the Western Conference finals.
